Articles about Protractor

How to interact with hidden elements with Protractor

The other day I was trying to interact with a hidden file input field:

{% highlight html %}

Select File {{selectedFilename()}}

{% endhighlight %}

And the CSS:

{% highlight css %}

.hidden { display: none; }

{% endhighlight %}

Which caused this problem:

Failed: Wait timed out after 100015ms

Workarounds include displaying it, interacting with it, hidding it again, which I didn't like.

Read more »
Ernesto Tagwerker on Protractor 23 Nov 2015
